text: (tavada) movun boruvama adhika vaśayen asannāha. anumata nomæti dæyama adhika vaśayen gila damamin siṭinnāha. mevænnan (yamkisi sādhāraṇayak sadahā) oba veta pæmiṇiyahot (oba kæmati nam) ovun atarē viniścaya denu. nætahot (viniścaya nokara) ovunva pratikṣēpa kara damanu. oba ovunva pratikṣēpa kara dæmuvada, ovun obaṭa kisima hāniyak kirīmaṭa nohæka. oba viniścaya kaḷahot, ovun atarē sādhāraṇa tīnduvakma labā denu. mandayat niyata vaśayenma allāh viniścayakaruvanva priya karannēya
